phrases: Spring is almost here, is not it?
When spring approaches, we tend to mellow out, do not we?
It is more unusual when you are not mellow.
Now that you mention it, you are right.
Dear Ai, this year's Carnevale brought more visitors than usual.
Things were really lively right up until yesterday, when it ended.
During Carnevale, we had many opportunities to work onboard our mentors' gondolas.
It gave us the chance to watch them up close as they worked with all sorts of customers.
It was a great hands-on learning experience.
I guess I still have a long way to go before I can become a Prima.
I am sure you will be just fine, Akari.
In fact, by the next time I visit Neo-Venezia, you might already be a Prima.
Do you remember that day Oboeteimasuka ano hi o
When your heart suddenly began to race Futo kanjita tokimeki o
The rays from the blue sky were pouring over you...
I could not look away, and when our eyes met Mitoreru to me ga atte
I could not help but smile Egao koboreta
It is just like a spiral Marude supiraare
I want to spend my days waving to you Itsumademo te o furitai hibi
This is my proof that I was here with you Koko ni tashika ni kimi to ita akashi
There is a path which stretches on ahead Kono saki mo tsuzuiteru michi ga aru
When you climb the next hill, Tsugi no saka o nobottara
Let us meet again Mata aimashou
You are really projecting your voice today.
While watching Athena work, I thought about a number of things.
From this day forward, I am Neo-Alice!
Sounds like you were inspired by your mentor during Carnevale, too.
Well, it is spring, after all.
Say, why do not we get some coffee at the cafe up ahead?
I wonder if he is having tea by himself...
How nice to see you all!
It is unusual to see you both having tea at this hour.
We are having a study session today.
If I cannot defeat this fiendish promotion exam, I will not be able to complete my training.
But what is with all these difficult words, one after another?
It is a pain just reading it.
Now, now, do not say that.
It is a pain just reading it.
Now, now, do not say that.
It is important for Salamanders to learn the workings of Aqua, Akatsuki.
This does not look like a study session...
It is more like Al's just tutoring you.
Do not call me Gachapen, Pony-boy!
I will go buy us some coffee.
Get another cup for us, too.
Get another cup for us, too.
You two will probably have yours soon, too.
Why are you being so doubtful?
We are practicing hard like this to prepare for when that day comes, are not we?
I cannot lose to Pony-boy, that is for sure!
Akari, President Aria, let us have lunch.
I heard the involtino from this shop is really delicious.
We do not have any bookings for this afternoon, so maybe we can call it a day.
There are not many people around after Carnevale, so it feels a little lonely, does not it?
Here is a glass of water, Akari.
Looks like he will be okay.
Spring is almost here in Neo-Venezia.
From the sky, you can see...
Here you go, this is your package.
It is addressed to you, Alicia.
Bringing you spring a little early.
My, it is from a customer we had during Carnevale.
It is the lady who came with her daughter.
They were from the south, right?
It is cherry tea and cherry jam.
Why do not we invite everyone over?
It is slow this time of year, so Akira and Athena might be able to join us, too.
It is the true face of Neo-Venezia.
If I think of it that way, it does not feel lonely at all.
If I think of it that way, it does not feel lonely at all.
How did it go, President Aria?
President Aria, could you help us with this next?
Alicia, I will make the cookies.
Thank you for inviting us today.
Athena's still working, but she said she would come when she is done.
President Maa, President Aria's pudgy-wudgy tummy is not a snack.
Okay everyone, let us have a seat.
Akari, could you bring the tea, please?
So that is the cherry jam?
I am really looking forward to it.
We have made a bunch of things, so have as much as you like.
First, we need to wash our hands and gargle.
For Primas, keeping in good health is an important part of the job.
I cannot lose to Pony-boy, but I cannot lose to Junior, either.
It makes it feel like spring, does not it?
This is the first time I have had cherry jam.
Did you want some more tea, President Aria?
Ah, you would like more bread, too?
Alicia, what kind of person was the customer who sent you this cherry tea?
It was a mother and daughter who were very close.
The building on your right is Palazzo Ducale.
And straight across is the Piazzetta of Piazza San Marco.
Once we leave this canal, the wind will become colder, so please be careful.
Neo-Venezia really is a wonderful place, is not it?
You have always wanted to come here, Mother.
But I guess I should have brought you when the weather was a little warmer.
I chose a bad time to come.
Not at all, I am happy we came.
We hardly ever see snow back home.
I chose a bad time to come.
Not at all, I am happy we came.
We hardly ever see snow back home.
Your daughter and Neo-Venezia have a wonderful gift for you.
The cold snow brought warmth to our customers' hearts, as well as our own.
Alicia's amazing, but so is Akira.
It is fine, it is fine!
I have good sense of balance!
If Akira was not balancing you out, you would already be at the bottom of the canal.
Sir, that is a woman's mask.
My beloved prince, please marry me!
I said it, I said it!
Princess, acting like a troublesome tomboy will not help to win me over.
It is not like I do not understand wanting to cut loose on vacation.
If I had snapped then, they probably would not have remembered their vacation as fondly.
Something similar happened with Athena, as well.
You will get a tummy ache.
I want it, I want it!
I want it, I want it!
Come now, be a good boy.
I want it, I want it!
What is with him all of a sudden?
Even though Athena looked pretty dopey, it was really cool.
Were you just talking about me, Alice?
Yes, about how you are really clumsy.
When I put mayonnaise on our pudding?
Or when I slammed into the glass door in the bathroom?
Actually, we were talking about how amazing the Three Great Water Fairies are.
Sounds like the three of you realized that you still have a long way to go.
I feel kind of depressed because of it.
Let us do our best, Aika.
It is true that the three of you have a long way to go.
We all have a long way to go.
You are already so amazing, we could never catch up to you.
So then, when are you going to be satisfied with yourself, Akira?
Probably... never, no matter how much better I get.
No matter how long I continue this job.
If you believe you have reached the top and become complacent, you cannot move forward.
That is why I think it is really important to believe you still have a long way to go.
Tomorrow, I will shine much brighter than I did today.
That is something you want to believe about yourself.
That feeling will probably never change, even if you become Primas.
Even after you step off your gondolas for the last time, that feeling will still be there.
Maybe that is how everyone finds their own brilliance?
In other words, it is only natural that you still have a long way to go.
And that is something very wonderful.
Maybe it is best to just cherish yourself and the long journey ahead, and have fun along the way?
Hey Alicia, pour me another cup of cherry tea, will you?
I feel so relaxed after today.
Alicia and the others will keep on chasing after their own brilliance, will not they?
If you can praise yourself honestly, and make everything in this world something to enjoy...
Grandma taught us that, did not she?
Our mentors, who we love so much, teach us many precious things...
I was thinking, maybe that is something really special?
But we cannot depend on it.
Someday, we have to become the brightest stars, so our own apprentices can say the same about us.
You need to be more self-conscious and feel the pressure!
We are definitely going to become the brightest stars!
We are going to be the brightest stars!
I wonder what kind of Primas they will become?
We are going to be the brightest stars!
I wonder what kind of Primas they will become?
But I am looking forward to that day.
I am looking forward to it too, but that will also be the day they leave us.
I am sure Akira will cry.
Though I am sure each of them will be unique...
They will become fairies, bringing new wonders to Neo-Venezia.
And then, the torch will be passed, will not it?
Akari, it seems like spring in Neo-Venezia helps bring out everyone is true colors.
But Akari, your true colors are...
A shore awash in golden waves Kin no nami kishibe ni
Filled with yearning, I open my eyes and it is morning Akogare mezameru no asa ni
As my thoughts focus intently on someone, Dareka no koto o tsuyoku omou toki
Love rests on my palm, held high Kakageta te no hira ni ai ga tomaru
A future guided by the flow of water and wind Mizu no yukue to kaze ga shimesu mirai
I gaze at the hope that surrounds this world Kono hoshi o tsusumu kibou mitsumete
The distant clouds of light are beckoning now Tooi kumo hikari ga sasou you ni yureru i am about to
A shore awash in golden waves Kin no nami kishibe ni
Filled with yearning, I open my eyes and it is morning Akogare mezameru no asa ni
